title: The Worst Cigar Brand Names!
itunes:title: The Worst Cigar Brand Names!
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire we welcome Jim Price from CLE/Eiroa Cigars as we take a look at the worst cigar brand names to grace a cigar band. In the first hour we fire up a cigar from the Care Package, CLE Corojo in the 11/18 size.

In the second hour, we continue the discussion as we take a look at the email of the week and we fill you in on our game go Cigar Bingo. Not sure what we are talking about? Those who get the Care Package do, and you should be a member for the next time!w perception and reality in the cigar market aren’t always the same. We will do this as we smoke the Asylum Pandemonium.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
